I showed Akane and Inori to the bath, since they\nwanted to rinse off.%K%P
As I went back to the living room, I thought\nabout the day's accomplishments.%K%P
'Akane's dancing was phenomenal.'%K%P
She didn't show any fatigue after all that, so\nthere should be no concern regarding her ability\nto sing and dance.%K%P
At this rate, Akane showed so much potential\nthat it seemed like only a matter of time before\nshe'd become a real idol.%K%P
'But...it sure is quiet.'%K%P
I got used to being alone until fairly recently.\nBut now it's the norm for Akane and Inori to be\nhere.%K%P
'That might be a good thing.'%K%P
Tsubaki used to be lively with tenants, much\nlike it is now.%K%P
If things stay this way, I wouldn't have any\ncomplaints.%K%P
'I need to thank you both.'%K%P
'About what?'%K%P
'Because of you two, Tsubaki Apartments is\ngetting its liveliness back.'%K%P
I turned around and answered Inori who was\nbehind me.%K%P
But when I turned around...%K%P
'What?!'%K%P
'Wh-What's the matter? Why did you cry out loud\nlike that?'%K%P
'That's for me to ask, Inori! Why are you\nlooking like that?!'%K%P
'Why aren't you wearing your clothes?!'%K%P
When I turned around, Inori was in a single bath\ntowel.%K%P
'Well, it's because I just got out of the bath.'%K%P
'That doesn't really answer my question.'%K%P
'Th-There's an unavoidable circumstance\nregarding this...'%K%P
When Inori bashfully twisted around, her big\nchest looked like it'd overflow.%K%P
I couldn't help but remember the incident when I\naccidentally felt her breasts and swallowed my\nbreath.%K%P
'I-I don't know what that circumstance is, but\nwill you please put on your clothes?'%K%P
'Actually...'%K%P
'My clothes got muddy when I fell earlier, so I\nhad to wash them. I didn't want to make the\nhouse dirty.'%K%P
Of course Inori was being conscientious.%K%P
'Then why don't you go to your room to get a\nchange of clothes?'%K%P
'Well, this is really hard to say, but...'%K%P
'I don't have a change of clothes.'%K%P
Don't have clothes...?%K%P
'Um, what do you mean by that?'%K%P
I could tell I was straining my face at Inori's\nwords.%K%P
'I actually only have...one set of clothes.'%K%P
'Are you kidding me...?'%K%P
'I'm sorry...'%K%P
Oh, man.%K%P
I noticed that she wore the same outfit every\nday, but didn't think it was the same set.%K%P
'H-How did you get away with it all this time?'%K%P
'I would wash them after taking a bath every\nnight.'%K%P
That implied she was only in her underwear in\nher room while her clothes dried.%K%P
'A-Anyway, I'll try to find something you can\nwear, so just hang tight.'%K%P
'Are you sure?'%K%P
'Yes, it'd be better for me.'%K%P
I needed to handle this before Maika returned, I\ncouldn't let her see this.%K%P
'Is that so? Then, I'll happily accept the\noff--'%K%P
'I'm back!'%K%P
'What?!'%K%P
Th-This is the worst.%K%P
Why did Maika have to come back from school at\nthe worst timing ever?%K%P
Maika's approaching footsteps sounded like a\ndeath sentence coming.%K%P
'Oh, it's so hot. Did I forget to chill the tea?\nHuh?'%K%P
It's over.%K%P
'Sho... What the heck are you doing?'%K%P
'Th-There's a reason behind this...'%K%P
'Sure, of course. How do you explain being alone\nin a room with a girl who's only wearing a\ntowel?'%K%P
'W-Well, it's actually my fault. I was really\nbad at it so I dirtied my clothes.'%K%P
'We moved around and sweat a lot, so that's why\nI took a bath.'%K%P
'Inori?! Are you saying that on purpose?!'%K%P
'Hmm... Your clothes got dirty and you sweat a\nlot. Wh-What the heck were you two doing?!'%K%P
'You're mistaken! Maika, don't make any weird\nassumptions!'%K%P
'Wh-What assumptions?!'%K%P
'Hey Sho. I'm done with the bath.'%K%P
'Good timing. Akane, will you tell Maika what we\ndid...today...?'%K%P
'Hey, hey. I don't have any clothes. Will you\nlend me some?'%K%P
'Akane, you too?!'%K%P
When I looked over for rescue, there stood\nAkane, only wearing a bath towel.%K%P
'Akane and Inori, you both don't have a change\nof clothes?!'%K%P
After I got to explain, she looked at them in\nshock.%K%P
Turns out, they'd been washing their only outfit\nevery night.%K%P
'You both got away with it until now, but you're\ngonna need more clothes.'%K%P
With so much physical movement involved,\nchanging clothes was a must.%K%P
'It's true. You're in trouble with just one set.\nEspecially with Sho here.'%K%P
Maika glared at me with the most reproachful\neyes.%K%P
'Fortunately there's still time to go buy\nclothes. I'll go for them since they definitely\ncan't.'%K%P
They both had to borrow and change into Maika's\nclothes.%K%P
'I'm headed to the shopping street, so will you\nstay at home, Sho?'%K%P
'No, I'm going with you.'%K%P
'Come again?'%K%P
'Why do you look so surprised? You'll need\nsomeone to help you carry all those clothes.'%K%P
'Well, if you're okay with it, by all means. I'm\ngonna go get ready, so be prepared to go, okay?'%K%P
'Yup, got it.'%K%P
After Maika left the living room, I headed for\nmy room to get ready.%K%P
'Hmm... I can't make up my mind.'%K%P
We were in a women's clothing store located on\nthe corner of the shopping street.%K%P
The shopping street was one of the liveliest\nplaces in Kannagi.%K%P
There are department stores, resturants, cafes,\nand all kinds of shops and places here.%K%P
Maika looked serious, comparing multiple\noutfits.%K%P
'Yup... I think this will suit her. Sho, what do\nyou think?'%K%P
'Yeah, I think it'll look good.'%K%P
'But this one might look pretty good too. What\ndo you think?'%K%P
Maika knew how to pick the designs that would\nbring out Akane and Inori's character.%K%P
Honestly, I thought all of them would look good,\nbut it's probably different from a girl's\nperspective.%K%P
'I think it's fine?'%K%P
'Come on... Why do you seem so uncomfortable?'%K%P
'Uh.'%K%P
I was at a loss for words when Maika pointed\nthat out.%K%P
I tagged along to carry the clothes, but I\nshould've known I'd be stuck in the women's\nclothing section.%K%P
As a man, I felt pretty embarrassed there.%K%P
'You stick out more when you look around all\nweird like that.'%K%P
'I do know that.'%K%P
In any case, I don't think I could ever get used\nto this discomfort.%K%P
'Hey Maika, let me stand closer to you.'%K%P
'What?! Wh-What do you mean by closer?!'%K%P
'Thought it would look more natural if we acted\nlike a couple.'%K%P
'C-Couple?! You're such an idiot! Just act\nnormal, will you?!'%K%P
'But see, take a look around us.'%K%P
I saw a few couples around us linking arms and\npicking out clothes.%K%P
'I would be nervous if I was with Akane or\nInori, but I'm more comfortable with you,\nMaika.'%K%P
'What do you mean by that?'%K%P
'It means I trust you. We used to link arms as\nkids, remember?'%K%P
'How many years ago was that...?'%K%P
'Not convinced?'%K%P
'Ugh, just stand close to me. I'm fine as long\nas we don't link arms!'%K%P
'I appreciate it, thanks.'%K%P
I stood right next to Maika and looked at the\noutfit she was holding.%K%P
'Hey! Y-Your face is too close!'%K%P
'I can see better this way. Anyway, this is the\noutfit you chose for Inori?'%K%P
'Nice. But how about this one?'%K%P
'Y-Yeah? Then this is the first set.'%K%P
'The first set? How many sets are you thinking\nof buying?'%K%P
'Well, I'd like to have two or three sets\nmyself. They also need comfy indoor clothes\ntoo.'%K%P
'You're buying that much?'%K%P
I assumed she was only picking out one outfit\nfor them.%K%P
'You put in a lot of thought for each outfit\ntoo.'%K%P
'Of course! We're girls, we can't slack off. It\nhas to be cute.'%K%P
'Plus, even if they do look good in everything,\nI have to pick out the cutest ones. My\nreputation's on the line here.'%K%P
'I guess so.'%K%P
'All right! let's go check that section over\nthere.'%K%P
Maika marched through the store to continue her\nsearch.%K%P
'H-Hey! Wait for me!'%K%P
While I chased down Maika, who was rummaging\nthrough piles of clothes, an accessory caught my\neye.%K%P
'This...would look good on Maika.'%K%P
It wasn't part of our initial objective, but an\naccessory wouldn't hurt.%K%P
After we finished our purchase of carefully\nchosen outfits and underwear, the sun was\nalready setting.%K%P
'You bought a lot.'%K%P
'Really? I tried to keep it at the bare\nminimum.'%K%P
'Sure...'%K%P
This was the bare minimum? How much did she\nusually buy?%K%P
'If a girl's shopping for clothes, it usually\ntakes up the whole day. I tried to be quick\nsince it was an emergency.'%K%P
Using up a whole day to shop for clothes? A\ngirl's commitment to fashion can really be\nsomething.%K%P
Certainly different from me. I tend to\nprioritize functionality over design.%K%P
'We haven't gone shopping together in a while.\nIt was fun.'%K%P
'R-Really?'%K%P
'Yup. I feel at ease with you, Maika.'%K%P
'M-Me too... Um... *Mumble*'%K%P
'Hmm? Did you say something?'%K%P
'N-Never mind!'%K%P
'Are you sure? All right then, wanna go again?'%K%P
'Sho, are you saying that you want to spend time\nwith me?'%K%P
'Only if you want to.'%K%P
'S-Sure, I can go out with you from t-time to\ntime?'%K%P
'Cool, then let's do this again.'%K%P
'Okay...'%K%P
We proceeded to walk in silence for a little\nwhile.%K%P
Even in silence, I felt a pleasant air flowing\nbetween Maika and I.%K%P
'Oh yeah. I have something for you.'%K%P
'For me?'%K%P
'Yeah, it's this.'%K%P
I handed a hair pin to Maika.%K%P
'Hmm? Is this for me?'%K%P
'I've inconvenienced you by having Akane and\nInori stay at the apartments.'%K%P
Maika's eyes were coming and going from my face\nto the hair pin in my hand.%K%P
'Um, are you sure I can have it?'%K%P
'Of course. I bought it for you.'%K%P
'You...bought it for me...'%K%P
'I'm...really, really happy. Thanks Sho.'%K%P
'S-Sure. I'm glad you like it.'%K%P
I wasn't able to directly look at Maika who was\nsmiling and holding the pin near her chest. I\nscratched my face to hide myself.%K%P
'I wasn't expecting a gift from you. Since\nyou've been all about Akane and Inori recently.'%K%P
'That's...true.'%K%P
I was about to deny Maika's remark, but when I\nthought about the past couple days, I sure was\ndevoted to them.%K%P
'But even then, you still thought of me.'%K%P
'Of course, you're my dearest childhood friend.\nI'll never leave you.'%K%P
I knew we hadn't been spending much time\ntogether, but I never intended to neglect her.%K%P
'Your dearest childhood friend, huh? Sho, why\nare you so active with Akane and Inori?'%K%P
'It's because I want to protect them. I want to\nprotect Tsubaki Apartments and save Akane since\ngetting to know her.'%K%P
'I don't want to see Tsubaki go, especially\nafter everything it's done for me.'%K%P
'I know, but what's happening to the apartments\nis inevitable. Don't be bound by it.'%K%P
'I'm not. I'm just doing what I want.'%K%P
'Ugh, you're always so stubborn when it comes to\nthings like this.'%K%P
'Is that wrong?'%K%P
'Nope. That's why I--'%K%P
She stopped herself and bashfully looked the\nother way.%K%P
'All right. If you're gonna say that, I'll\nsupport you as much as I can.'%K%P
'Don't think this is all about you. I'm doing it\nfor Akane and Inori too.'%K%P
'I know that.'%K%P
'If it doesn't work out, we'll just have to\nclose it. Do what you can, but don't go\noverboard.'%K%P
You can count on me.%K%P
I'll rehabilitate Akane and save Tsubaki\nApartments no matter what.%K%P
I felt grateful for her generous words as we\nheaded back home.%K%P
